column1: Kata Robata////The highlights of our order were the peppercorn salmon nigiri and the tuna carpaccio (a special).  In general
column2: the nigiri and sashimi were better than the rolls.  We ordered the Houston roll and the MS. Snapper.  The Snapper roll was good
column3: if small.  The Houston roll was pretty average
column4: and hard to eat.  Friends ordered the Caribbean roll and were disappointed.
